scripts.test: lab -v -L -P test -t 85 -I document -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/coverage.html
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"`; echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i && npm run prettier && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org
